channel.title: [PI] NPC Drops
channel.description:
Okay people this is the problem I'm having. I want to make goblins drop Dungeoneering tokens for floor one of my Dungeoneering minigame. I add this in Source/Data/CFG/NPCdrops.tsm.
#Goblin 100:1 19864:10
The monster id of the goblin is 100 and and I want it to drop 10 tokens everytime. I save it and compile and go to kill a goblin. They drop nothing. This isnt that that where admins and owners cant get drops. I had a player kill a goblin and nothing dropped. HELP ME ASAP.
THANKS!
